ca.uhn.hl7v2.app

Interface Connection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActiveConnection, LazyConnection

    public interface Connection
    Interface for a connection

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Activate this connection
      void close()
      Closes the connection
      ExecutorService getExecutorService() 
      Initiator getInitiator()
      Returns an Initiator instance
      InetAddress getRemoteAddress()
      Returns the address on the remote end of this connection.
      Integer getRemotePort()
      Returns the port on the remote end of this connection.
      boolean isOpen()
      Returns true if this connection is open

        Returns true if this connection is open
        Returns:
        true if this connection is open

      • getRemoteAddress

        InetAddress getRemoteAddress()
        Returns the address on the remote end of this connection. Note that in the case of a LazyConnection this method may return null.
        See Also:
        getRemotePort()

      • getExecutorService

        ExecutorService getExecutorService()

      • getRemotePort

        Integer getRemotePort()
        Returns the port on the remote end of this connection. Note that in the case of a LazyConnection this method may return null.
        See Also:
        getRemoteAddress()
